channel.title: Bloodborne
channel.description:
Anyone have a PS4 with Bloodborne? If so, do you like it?
Being a long time Souls fan it is definitively a refreshing environment to be in, I really enjoy the game (too much maybe, on NG++ atm, still playing regularly)
